content.detailedDescription: Was camping in rural central missouri 20 miles south west of rolla. around 2am i went outside our tent to use the restroom. i was star gazing for a few moments and noticed one of the "stars" was moving slightly. i rubbed my eyes and cleaned my glasses and watched for a good 5 minutes. while intensely viewing the star i quickly began noticing two separate faint blue lights flashing in and out in an orbit like way around the "star". yet, the slight movement of the start that that originally caught my eye was in fact darting towards each flash of faint blue light. i witnessed this for several minutes before going back to the tent. the "star" was extremely high in the sky, perhaps in space itself or the upper atmosphere. for as high as the light objects were i believe that the slight movements the star made towards the blue lights must have been extremely fast, as it was moving back and forth, stopping, and then shifting toward another blue light repeatedly.
content.summary: Star-like object with two faint blue lights moving together.

content.detailedDescription: Saw objects hover over a house while driving north hwy 210 15 miles north of campbellsville seen object 3 differnt times. above trees and object moved out of view behind trees objects appeared dull grayish just bigger than a car smaller than a house no sound no markings
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Seen while driving north on ky 210.

content.detailedDescription:
The reason i write this is because this occurrence happened to me twice as i have on a rare opportunity to witness on two separate occasions two red orbs������
the first time was on vancouver island (summer of 1996) on very bright star night this was a group sighting and not just one person ������i must point out that we were far from city lights������ at a friend������s farm. just entertaining ourselves in the evening ������no we were not drunk ������just relaxing on sun loungers totally oblivious and never discussed anything remotely about looking for ufo������s in the sky, not until we saw what we saw the two red orbs. i can surly say without a doubt, the hair on my arms stood rock hard. explain what we saw no! i cannot, our conversion totally took a different track making suggestions and conclusions, they did not just vanish, and it was the distance between them and us was getting farther away and harder to see them
my thought was that they were on a mission as probes sent ahead to scout around, we watched them as far as we can see them before they were out of sight. 
the second time was in north carolina
once again they were fairly high in the dark star lit night sky, no sound came from them and we could clearly see they were two individual objects as i can see the stars between them as they passed me by. the usual questions arose when this subject brought up, (lights from a distant car brake lights, airplane flying close by, as they have red and green lights, jet fighter, helicopter, as you know the usual debunking stuff)
i live in the country, away from city lights and traffic, airfield, military bases, so again lights from other moving cars, planes, helicopters the answer is a blatantly no! what i saw is unexplainable, wish someone could
if anyone can put an explanation to what these things were, we will be very interested to hear from someone.
looking forward to hearing from someone
regards
phil
now i watch the skies.





my response to the second sighting
1.	where you and what were were you doing at the time?
���x	this was early in the morning around 5:30am in the morning i was at home walking towards my truck which is parked in the rear drive way, getting ready to drive for work.
2. what made you first notice the object?
���x	 the moment i stepped into the truck, i just happened to see them these two red orbs in the sky, knowing i had witnessed them before and had thought great again. this time my concentration was encapsulated into more thinking on what i was watching  once again

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
���x	unable explain exactly what we saw!, only conclusion was that they were probes sent ahead to scouting mission
4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.
���x	when i saw once again these two red orbs in the sky, they were fairly high in the dark star lit night sky. no sound came from them and i could clearly see they were two individual objects as i can see the stars between them as they passed me by in a straight line, they remained at a distance apart unti9l i no longer was able to see them as they were too far away

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
���x	my feeling before the sighting was normal as can be getting ready to drive to work like any other uneventful morning. my feelings after the sighting, was ecstatic and i wanted them to turn round and come back my way again to see more of them and for a longer period of time


6. how did you lose sight of the object?
���x	i watched them as long as i could until they were too far away to been 

please help to explain what i saw

yours sincerely 
phil
content.summary: A rare opportunity to witness two red orbs on two occasions

content.detailedDescription: I was in the backyard near lockport, ny at about 8:50 p.M. on saturday august 27, 2011 when someone drew my attention to a single bright, yellow, unwavering light in the sky, to the north, that was larger than the background stars and was traveling east to west.  the sky was cloud free and the weather was calm.  it was then followed by up to 20 or 25 more items of the same type, all of which appeared to travel together in a line from east to west where they seemed to vanish in the distance.  they were extremely interesting in the way they looked and the way they traveled.  they did not travel in a distinct formation, but appeared to be in a loose traveling group moving along fairly quickly.  they appeared to hover, slow down, speed up, and change direction at will, all while traveling in an east to west line.  the event lasted about 5 to 10 minutes.  they are unlike anything i've ever seen in the sky, night or day, at any previous time.  they did not appear to be a group of airplanes or a meteor shower.  i felt amazed then, and do now, and i can't wait to hear the explanation of the event because i'm sure i'll learn something new and interesting, whether the explanation involves the weather, the military, or whatever.
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Fireball,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Unknown
content.summary: 20 to 25 bright, yellow, unwavering lights traveled together in a line in the sky to the north from east to west at about 8:50 pm 08-27-11.

content.detailedDescription: It was the evening of july 25, 2008 and some friends and i were gathered together at the top of orleans mountain looking at the wildfires in the distance below and watching for shooting stars in the sky. it was roughly 10:00 p.M. and there were about a dozen of us there. i was facing northeast when i noticed what appeared to be several satellites moving through the sky from different directions. as they moved closer to each other, i became aware that there were 4 of these lights. i really did not think much of it until the lights moved even closer to each other and then began circling around each other, as if they were moving in formation. i���ve never seen satellites do this, but shrugged it off. then, they all suddenly and simultaneously streaked across the night sky at speeds i���ve never seen before, once again in totally different directions. they did not make any discernible sounds. they moved so fast they were out of sight within a second. two of my friends and i jumped up at the same time shouting ���oh my god, did you see that?!��� it was as if they had moved at the speed of light! to this day, i have never heard of any known flying object that can move at such speeds.
content.summary: 4 star-like moving objects come from different directions in sky, then circle around each other before taking off in different directions at unearthly speed.

content.detailedDescription: Traveling north on prospect. saw objects in the distance in front of the car. pulled over to watch. objects moved slowly and once they passed over us they became invisible. at 10pm it was very dark out side. looked like lights in the sky, larger than a planet. they slowly moved accross
content.summary: 21 objects moving from the ne to s. west amber color

content.detailedDescription:
I was about to leave my parents house when i finished babysitting when my sister said "look at those lights" so ke my mom and dad, my fiancee and my uncle and two cousins looked up and watched these red-orange lights travel from the southern part of las vegas towards where i was on the west side of las vegas. they went straight and then dissapeared in the clouds i had a dream about that same event that morning everthing in my dream happened except the part where i was abducted. i recorded it hard to see but you can see the red dots of them im not to sure what to believe if it was a ufo or something else but this is about the 3rd time in the past 12 years i have lived in las vegas.
i cannot upload my video here i am using my phone but you can go to my youtube youtube.Com/sw33tzshortz
content.summary: We saw 7 or 8 red-orange lights travel in the same direction into clouds

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my cousin's back yard, speaking with a friend of mine 
when i noticed what appeared to be a bright red firework descending in the sky just above the edge of a fence. i immediately interrupted myself and asked my friend what it was. he stood, turned around and looked to where i had motioned. 
about this time, the falling red light diverted course drastically and began ascending and descending back and forth in rapid succession, all the while continuously changing color and shape. the colors varied, first red, then gold and green and possibly even blue. the object transitioned from one color to another with absolute fluidity. it went from falling and looking like it had a tail, to taking the form of a sphere before changing shape several more times to various shapes that are hard to describe. it then took a much more conventional and deliberate path west over the ca-99 freeway. the entire sighting lasted approximately 15 seconds. 
the object began to leave my field of vision due to obstruction. at this time i ran around the front of his house where i saw neighbors gathered outside who had also just witnessed the event. at this point i tried to regain sight of the object, but did not see it again. i have never seen anything like it before and it was completely inaudible. i could not make out a definite shape for the object, which seemed to be.....Simply light. the lights did not seem to be placed on a craft, the light seemed to be the craft itself.
just after pointing out the object to my friend and noticing it's erratic behavior, i pulled out my cell phone to record the object. i was only able to get mere seconds of the object, which was traveling west and away from us and had stopped changing shape/color by the time i began filming. i have no idea what it was and my friend and i are absolutely certain it was not a conventional aircraft.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Appeared to be only light, changing colors fluidly between red, gold, green, amber, and also changing shape constantly while moving erratically. completely silent.

content.detailedDescription: Saw two green flashes of light about 10 minutes apart from one another. filled sky. occurred during rainfall of hurricane irene. no objects seen due to thick clouds
content.summary: Green flash

content.detailedDescription: On 10-27-2011 i snapped a photo of the michigan ave bridge in chicago looking north.  at the time i didn't notice anything but when i got home and uploaded the photos later that night i noticed something in the sky on the photo.  not sure if it was some weird reflection from the city lights or what but i am uploading the photo with this so i will let you be the judge.
content.summary: Ufo over michigan ave and the chicago river?

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north on eldorado bulvd at exactly 2:25 pm saturday 8/57/2011.Just passing bowmens club on right. when i noticed 2 bright lights in front of me in the sky above hill, houses. about 400 feet-up. decending slowly down and to the left.They looked like 2 boxes a few feet apart.My 1st thought was maybe a kids kite in the park that i new was just over the hill.I was driving up a hill at the time so it was really easy to notice.And there was other traffic right next to me and behind me. my thought was they have to being seeing this too! as i was driving over the hill wacthing these 2 boxes decending down toward the ground, they were just a few feet apart. i thought maybe it could be two white birds decending in perfect formation until they started turning downward and the two boxes strecthed-out longer into two perfect shapes, like rectangles.At this point i got excited and looked for place to pullover. then these two objects kind of levaled-out and moved north towards folsom lake away from me. they moved about a thousand yards away in just a second then quickly faded away from view.So i kept driving just maybe one block and they reapeird again getting brighter in seconds. my thought at this time was maybe it was an airplane reflecting in the sun. a real white airplane. but it was two objects just a few feet apart.At this time a realalised the size of the objects were about the size of 2 cars. i glued my eyes on these and slowed way down and almost completetly stopped at the green light in front of the park. then the to objects slowly faded away again, so i pulled overand got out my binockgulars. the objects were gone but there was a vulture flying around up there where i last saw it so i focused on it. hoping the object would return. after a few minutes it did not so i took off driving north again on eldorado bulvd towards green valley road. i crossed green valley rd this turns into salmon falls road about two miles still looking towards the west when the object appiared again. this time it was one object, but looked like a square box. i emideantly pulled over. it was moving north rapedly about 6or8 hundred feet high and got behind some trees blocking my view. so i took off after it and could see it in the next few minutes through the trees as i was was hurring to get about a mile up the road to a place i new was clearer of trees. i noticed the object kept pulsating in and out of brightness and vision, and turning while i was chasing it. right when i was getting to the clearing it got real bright and stopped for a second.It looked like a perect big white box in the sky slightly rotating about 800 feet above the lake. folsom lake.With a hillin the backgrund behind it.Then it started moving slowly to the west and faded away. i stayed there for about five more minutes hopping to see it again but i did not. i realized this whole encouter lasted about 12 minutes and over 5 miles.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 lights decending. then moving, then one light moving.

content.detailedDescription: my sighting was on saturday, august 20, 2011 approximately 10:30 pm.  i am 49 years old and reside in north east mesa, united states.  i went out into the back yard to have a cigarette and shortly after i was outside i saw 2 red-orange orbs moving in the sky from the west to the east.  there were no exterior lights on in the back yard and the two orbs were very prominent, they appeared shortly after i went outside. they came into view as they fly over the house from the front yard to the back yard. my first reaction was one of amazement; i do not recall ever seeing anything quite like these before. that is what held my attention; they did not look like other planes or aircraft i have seen at night.   i consider myself a logic based person and i was trying to figure out what they were. i was thinking if they are not a ufo, what they could be.  they were at about the elevation single engine airplanes normally fly over at, about 45 degrees above the horizon from my view point.  they were not moving quickly across the sky; i would say approximately at about the speed of a single engine aircraft.  there was no blinking white lights or other colors of normal tell-tale signs of a regular aircraft navigation lights.  they were both this large reddish or red orange color in a bulb or orb shape with no definitive outer shape, they were fuzzy around the edges.  the diameter of the orbs seemed to be approximately twice as large as that of a normal small airplane from tip to tail and both orbs seemed to be the same size.  after the fact, i would say if i held my hand out at arm���s length the orbs were about the size of two of my fingertips together.  the color was a warm, fire-like color, almost pulsating, without any distinct pattern to the pulsing.  the orbs were opaque in the fact that i could not see through them or make out any distinguishing features other than the general orb shape.   the exterior air conditioner was on along the side of the home; however, there was no appreciable sound that i could hear.  they flew in close proximity to each other, but not in exact parallel, they were moving independently of each other, they did not circle each other or act in synch in a manner that i could tell.  there were definitely two distinct objects from what i could ascertain.  i had never seen anything quite like them, i was mesmerized by them.  i was the only person who saw them; there were no other witnesses with me.  my roommate was inside the home at the time, however, i honestly did not even think to tell him to come outside, i was fixated on the objects. they kept moving in an eastern direction, wavering a bit, one more in a direct path and the other starting to trail off a bit to the south east.  then the one orb just blinked out and vanished entirely���there was no residual color in the sky that i could see or any downward trails as a flair or such may make.  a second or two afterwards, the second orb faded out in a similar fashion.  the sky that night was clear, only some wisps of clouds.  i first thought that maybe they flew into a cloud, but then i realized afterward there were no clouds for them to fly into.  i stood and continued to look at the area in the sky where they had vanished; however, they did not reappear.  i do not know if they were extraterrestrial or not, i just do not have an explanation for what i saw.  my best guess is i viewed them for approximately 2 minutes before they vanished.
content.summary: 2 red-orange orbs observed in north east mesa

content.detailedDescription:
Beginning on august 23,2011, my family and i (among many other people) have been hearing that same loud rumble in the sky that is being reported all over the globe. it is an incredibly loud rumble in the sky that roars for about 2 minutes in duration and eventually fades away.

on august 23,2011, we were sitting in our living room, watching tv when we heard it again. we heard it between 7 or 8 times beginning around 7:30 pm(approx.) after not being able to figure out what the noise was, i did some online research. the exact same noise was heard at the rays baseball game, here in st. pete the night before. (the video of this incident is available online).

this noise continued again on wednesday, august 24,2011. my husband, 12 year-old son and i stepped outside in the hope that we could capture the sound on his cell phone. after uploading the video to my computer, i then noticed the orb or light that appears from behind the trees to the left. this light darts in and out of the clouds and behind the tree which lead me to believe that this is not part of the camera-along with the fact that it does not appear until the phone is pointed toward the sky. pleas note that we were not searching for unusual lights in the sky but simply trying to capture the sound of the very strange rumbling that we had been hearing,therefore,i did not see this with my own eyes as i was looking all around me, but only noticed on the video afterward. 

as far as the rumbling goes, i heard it one last time on thursday august 25,2011 and an hour after that, i heard what can only be described as a very loud,vibrating hum (which was also about 1-2 mins in duration).

i have heard nothing since.
content.summary: This object appeared after uploading a video of the strange ruble noise that we have been hearing in st. pete fl.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,
i have made this description yet at a french ufo society called grepi but i want to repeat it to you because of its very peculiar context.
it started at the swimming pool,when people like me in water or around the swimming pool looked up when helicopters belonging to the french "gendarmerie" went to and fro above the glass roof.Shortly after,as i was out at the poll's exit, one helicopter was just above the canal in front of the s.Pool, in the same position (not moving) above the water.Until that time i had thought of a car accident or trouble with a gang etc.(the helicopters were 2 or 3 at least).Then i started going home...Shortly after, still hearing and seeing the helicopters, i was going home,on foot.Shortly after i entered my street i heard a helicopter on my left, looked at it and saw, just at its right and behind, a small round disc or sphere going rather slowly,very regular.It was going at times in front of the blue sky and at others in front of white clouds,which gave me a feeling that this object was small and not very far from me,althought it is difficult to tell...I walk home during a bit more than 10 minutes,looking at the strange object untill it approached the horizon,almost (above the distant houses and other buildings),it went on a straight line from beginning to the end,never changed its direction,as it seemed.At the beginning of the observation it seemed that it went clearer on the top,i thought it was due to sunlight.
the important question i put to myself was: what were doing the helicopters in the sky? was it coincidence?Were they trying to find something they could have found on their radars?
if only i could give an answer!!!!!
this is very serious t���������������������������moignage,i wish i could find somebody who saw this object that day!I remember i crossed somebody and i almost stopped him but i hesitated,what a mistake!!!!
content.summary: Small black disc or sphere,silent with regular path,

content.detailedDescription: I was out watching a meteor showerwhen i saw an unusual light. i focused my binoculars on the object. it seemed to be round, with lights around it. it moved back and forth so fast that i could barely stay focused on it. it finally passed overhead. as it was about to disappear over the tree line a jet came very fast toward it from the northeast. when the jet was almost to the object, it made a 90 degree turn to the west, and disappeared in about two seconds. my wife also witnessed guise
content.summary: Circle of different colered lights, moving fast, and hovering. jet flew to it,and object made a 90 degree turn west and vanished

content.detailedDescription:
Myself, my girlfriend and an iraqi veteran (who has seen stealth bombers in action) were together at night under some trees when i first noticed something flying over us slightly to our right (we were facing east, so it came from ne....Possibly hillsboro airport?). this was shortly after the airshow so it could have been a stealth bomber with some new mode that our neighbor didn't know about, but he said it wasn't a stealth bomber or fighter. it had almost a cloudy effect to it, but this could be due to the only illumination was from the ambient light below. it seemed to bank to go sse as it crossed the little road we were on and it continued straight in a very fluid motion until it faded out of sight. it was a clear night and as it banked i could clearly see it looked like a boomerang with 2 side winglets, like if you could imagine a boomerang with the front flattened, so it's main width was flat and then it had side portions angling back. i shone a very narrow beam powerful flashlight at it and it didn't hit it (normally has about a 100 yard range), so it was higher than the treetops but was probably under 1000 feet. we all agree on that, due to the ambient light hitting it. it was huge!!! was the other conclusion. we couldn't be accurate as there was nothing to compare it against. also we don't know if that was it's accurate shape as it could have had a portion that didn't reflect ambient light and it was too short a time period to notice how any stars were blocked.
what was odd is that my girlfriend and i had seen another ufo a week before (orange circular shape around 9pm with no sound) in the same spot. we found others have seen this one and a photo exists on another website....So we weren't the only ones to see that one. we thought the orange one could have been a hoax, but this flying wing was definitely not a hoax. i suspect it was a military stealth experiment. the strange part was the lack of any sound whatsoever.
content.summary: Looked like some kind of military flying wing but it had no sound.

content.detailedDescription: I have been observing for approximately the last month, and half, triangular objects that i have seen ascend, follow straight flight, and descend then appear to change to circular glow that continued to ascend below line of sight. i have observed these triangular objects with binoculars, but i cannot make out a appearance except for the triangular position of the lights, the object at times appear to be transparent in nature, while observing these objects there is a humming, or buzzing like sound in the vicinity. over the last month, and half of observation of these objects i have felt as if there is a presence in the area, the light is white, blue in nature and at times appear to pulsate randomly, and at other times seem to keep timing perfectly. when these triangular lights are moving they seem to glide along, but they move as if you were watching someone accelerate, and decelerate  in sync power surges, i have noticed a pattern of activity with these objects as well, during the beginning of week(sunday, monday, tuesday, wednesday) they are much more active, and i have observed the objects much more during these nights, with a decline in the remaining days in the week(thursday, friday, saturday). i also went online during these sighting having wireless internet sitting outside observing, and have brought up live radar in the area showing all commercial airliners in the area that is in real time, and during these sightings there are nothing within 100 miles. these objects leave no contrail, i also attempted to record the objects on one occasion with electronic camera, and just prior to the sighting that i was going to record approximately nine thirty pm central time i had approximately twenty minutes prior placed new batteries in the camera, and proceeded with a test run with the camera showing full charge. at the time of the sighting of this object i tried to record only finding my batteries had no power upon trying to record the object in question. a family member was witness to this event, and other family, friends, and local law enforcement have witnessed these objects as i had pointed them out to several people in parking lot of local store.  these objects fly appear to be 50-100ft in size, and appear about size of golf ball. i have noticed on several occasions on nights that these objects are more active, i physically feel drained, and have noticed almost feeling of warmth when observing these objects at times. as for the cylinder shaped white glowing object i have only seen these three times in the area, but these have made me nervous at the time due to them appearing to be standing on end in the air with a diameter of approximately 5 ft, and height of approximately 12 ft, these objects i have seen appear in the horizon with my field of vision at approximately 25 degrees out of thin air, then ascend, and then begin to follow at flight path above the area only to disappear after slowly moving across the sky at approximately 20mph these cylinder object have been approximately within 150 ft of a family member, and i at one sighting, the other two sightings within 500-1000ft. i had followed them only to watch them just slowly fade out of sight, as if you were turning the burner down on the stove. i felt the most impacted as these came within a zone of comfort, my family member on the other hand did not feel bothered by the event but more interested than anything. since the start of witnessing the triangular lighted objects, and cylinder shaped objects, i have noticed while just observing the areas sky at angle of horizon to approximately 45 degrees line of sight i keep witnessing what appears to be just quick streaks or flashes of light that last fractions of a second. also just to note one of the local law enforcement officers in the area tried to record lights around the same time last year on his dash camera, but when he went to play back what he had recorded at the station it was complete static, with no apparent reason. i also have trouble with cell phone wanting to function properly when observing these objects, i continue to see these objects everynight, and will continue to update, and i will eventually get hold of high resolution recorder, and submit video. ive tried to take video on cell phone several times but my phone will not even pick up bright stars
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Four different descripstions: triangular lights, cylinder glowing object, circular glow dissapearing, flashes of light

content.detailedDescription: I was at a friends house waiting outside,i don't know why i looked  to the west about 5 to 10 minutes after sunset.There was still plenty of light but the sun had set behind the trees a few minutes earlier and all of a sudden i saw an orange translucent orb(similar to setting sun but very much smaller) about tree top high going from north to south.It went behind trees and back into view and kept going at the same hight and speed.I was wondering in my mind what could it be,a mylar balloon,a large bubble of some type,i just could not figure it out,i was just so stunned.I watched it for several seconds,there was no traffic at all at the time in fact there was no sounds at all,no kids no dogs,no birds not even insects it's as if everything stopped for a few seconds,no sound at all,and no sound from the object,and no wind to push it if it was a balloon or bubble.A minute or two later my friend's sister came home from work and i asked her if she saw it,she looked at me funny and said nooo!I guess she thought i was crazy so i never told anyone else about it.I now carry a digital camera with me in hopes of another sighting.
content.summary: Translucent orb simular color to sunset,although sun had set 5 to 10 minutes earlier

content.detailedDescription: Round object seen from visable horizon to visable horizon. un determined altitude, therefore velocity undetermined. red orange constant color. moved very fast. no sound what so ever.
content.summary: Red orange light moving quickly from visable horizon to visable horizon. from nne to ssw.

content.detailedDescription: Was taking dogs out in back yard. saw a flash from north (i believe) over my house (by ellington airforce base, nasa is close too)around a second later i heard what could best be described as a medium calibre gunshot from the same direction. i immediatly though  "about a mile away" and tried to see around the house. got my dogs inside, as they got very excited/antsy and opened the window to that direction to keep an eye out.
content.summary: Flash of quick blue light lit up clouds - short noise unlike thunder

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were watching the detroit freedom festival fireworks in 1988. this took place on june 30th and lasted about 35minutes, starting at 10:06pm ( link removed to investgator field cms 08/28/11 05:13 cst flg). 

we were parked on a stretch of road in auburn hills that offers a view of downtown detroit approx 20-25 miles in the distance. there were maybe a dozen other cars parked there to watch. unfortunately it was just too far to really enjoy it. my friend got bored and started looking skyward at the cloudless, starry sky. he pointed out a satellite passing by from west to east. the satellite was directly overhead and unmistakable - no flashing, solid white point moving across the sky at an altitude that could have been a low earth orbit. after watching it only a few seconds, it did a u-turn without any change in velocity, and started heading back west. after only a couple of seconds heading back west it shot off in a se direction (aprox a 120 degree change of direction) and disappeared in an instant.

my friend and i looked at each other and confirmed that we just saw the same thing. we were both very knowledgable in science (i was studying physics at the time) and we knew what we saw was not within the realm of possibility as we were familiar with it. we were both calm, and we didn't draw any attention to ourselves. as far as we knew, nobody else saw it as they were fixated on downtown detroit. about 15-20 minutes later i brought it up to my friend. by that time his rational, scientific mind had convinced him that he did not see what we thought we saw. mine probably would have too, had my friend not seen what i had just seen and confirmed it at the time of the sighting.
content.summary: Satellite does u-turn, then shoots off at angle and disappears

content.detailedDescription:
At 3:05 am on august 19th, 2011 in north seattle, wa, i stepped outside my front door which faces northeast. the skies were very clear.  i was observing jupiter���s nightly transit toward the moon, which was by rough estimate, 13 degrees to the north and a few degrees above the moon.  at this time, i was shocked to see a very bright white object, much brighter than jupiter.    the object was coming from below (east) and to the south of the moon. it appeared slightly ovoid, with no flashing or undulating light. it was obviously very high up.
  i yelled urgently for my companion to come see, and he bolted to the door.  i hope i didn���t wake my neighbors with my exclamations of shock.  as a lifetime night owl and sky watcher, this was something out of the ordinary.
  the object came from below and to the right of the moon on an east to west trajectory, traveling at a rate of speed similar to that of the iss.   upon investigation i found that this could not be the iss, which travels west to east.  i have witnessed the iss several times.  this object���s brightness was greater.  because trees blocked my view, (the object rose to above the trees to clear sky), the length of travel that i witnessed was about 20 degrees.

 i withheld any real excitement until i checked satellite transits, although i have never seen a satellite this large or bright,  including nasa for  iss transits on this date.  the iss was to make a pass at 23:21:23 to 23:31:43 on 8/19/11, but the opposite direction of what i saw, and not the right time.    i could find nothing, satellite or otherwise, which should have been flying over, anywhere near the time or on the path of what i saw.  
although i didn���t know how to report it at the time, from this same location approximately 1 year ago, also in the am hours,  i saw an event that wasn���t physically possible by humans.  i saw what i thought was a satellite or high altitude jet, going south to north from my same location. without changing speed, it did a right angle turn in the sky. a second or two later, it did another right angle turn back to the direction it had come from, then instantly sped to three times faster and out of sight.
content.summary: Very bright object passes east to west beside moon with jupiter nearby

content.detailedDescription: Above our house. 4 ojects in a row
content.summary: 4 objects flying in a row

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home with my wife.  we were southbound at the intersection of 244th street and 400th ave in enumclaw wa.  to the east i saw the lights of two commercial airliners and i looked in their direction.

as i looked i saw several ufo lights in the sky at about the same elevation as the airliners but appearing much smaller and closer. i stopped to watch them. i thought that they were very much out of place for the time of day.  i was 8:40 at night and was about 75% dark.  i thought if they were ultralight aircraft in a club they were flying too late because it was too dark.  they had the appearance of being balloons with lights of some type attached to them.  i thought that they must be floating on the prevailing local air currents.

they were much dimmer than the airplane lights.  five or six of the lights were at 30 degrees at that time and they were in a random pattern.  as i watched five more ascended in an arc pattern.  meanwhile the lights which had first appeared had risen higher and faded out.  the lights in the arc ascended more.  then i saw, against a nearby mountain, three more lights ascend below the ones in the arc.  these lights were between myself and the nearby mountain which i judge to be no more than five miles away.

all the lights continued to ascend and travel southwest, and they all faded out when they got to about the 80 degree point. 

while we watched i telephoned a friend who lives close to where we were.  she watched them for awhile from her window.
content.summary: 13 lights seperately ascended from 10 degrees against nearby mountainside and all faded out when they reachedi  80 degrees

content.detailedDescription: I live in a traffic pattern to and from ohare airport, where all planes have flashing lights when traveling above. i saw a faint object moving northeast towards ohare, no blinking lights, the object got real bright like a star, i ran and got binoculars and observed what looked like a intensely bright sphere or star and i could see a definate outline(round edge)on the left side of the object. it changed direction moving east, then southeast, and with a quick fade out, was gone. there was no cloud cover, no sound and stars were visible in it's path. i looked and there is an earleir report today in texas seeing the same type of bright star like object.This did not appear to be a satelight either.
content.summary: Intensely bright shere that fades quickly and then is gone

content.detailedDescription:
Went outside at 2:30 a.M. auguust 25, 2011 to catch my breath after a coughing fit. walked to end of my sidewalk to the east and a brillant light caught my eye at about 45 degrees.  it appeared to be about the size of 1/2 inch next to my index finger. this is the flight path of tinker afb in midwest city, ok so i expected it to be one of the many planes i sight in daytime and nighttime. light was totally still so i figured it was flying toward me. i put my finger up to site it and it stayed the same size, not moving at all. it remained in the same position the entire 10 minutes i was outside. in about 1 minute 2 very small lights appeared next to the bottom of it and began making random, impossible flight manouveres all around the stationery object. one small object was bright red, one was bright blue. they didn't stay together, rather they moved all about up to the appearance of a couple inches around the stationery object. 
i went into the house to get a camera, but could only find my phone camera which takes bad pictures. i went outside to snap some pics fully expecting it to be gone since it had taken at least a couple minutes to find the phone. i took pics of the red and blue objects, but wouldn't take a pic of the stationery one. i tried over and over to no avail. suddenly the bright light was gone with only the blue and red ones left, then after a few seconds they too disappeared. no sound was made by anything including frogs, crickets etc. it was totally windless. i didn't hear the usual road traffic off i-35 or i-240. it was like i had muffs on my ears.
content.summary: 3 objects--1 stationery, 2 moving

content.detailedDescription: Driving on manchester road with my girlfriend on passenger seat near sams club by west county mall. she sees the weird lights and asks me about it. i told her it was probably an airplane. she persisted that it did not look normal. i took a second look and realised that there were no headlights just flickering lights. we took a left turn into the car dealership where a couple of people were also parked and looking at the sky. the object was not making noise and was just hoovering. we did a u turn and left because i was freaked out.
content.summary: Red white and blue lights flickering in a triangle pattern hovering over a car dealership

content.detailedDescription:
Wife went out back for a cigarette, seconds later called me outside. was a bright red light light in the sky moving slowly in a southerly direction. the light was quite brilliant initially, looked diffused - fuzzy around the edges. the luminosity faded as it move across the horizon, so i am assuming it was moving away from us. 

the path remained a fairly straight line, however the key thing that was unusual was it appeared to be stuttering up and down quite alot as it moved along. at this point it was viewable to us for about a minute until the light passed beyond view behind a large oak, after atleast a minute it appears on the other side. looked smaller, still travelling the same general speed. about half-way through the viewable space between the tree and the neighboring set of townhouses, it simply vanished. 

as we were starting our, "that was weird" conversation - another similar light appeared back over to the far left - completely out of nowhere - perhaps a bit higher on the horizon as the other - and began to move in the same direction, with the same behavior.

i jumped into the house to grab my phone to take some video. i was able to follow the object with my camera for about 30-45 seconds before it again moved behind the tree. 

i went out on the walk to walk around the tree to try to spot it and follow with the camera, but this time it was already gone. 

the video is very poor, it was simply too dark. the most you can see is a very small light from the object moving slowly across the sky. 

we hung around for another 10-15 minutes or so, but nothing else showed. 

we've lived here for a number of years and have become accustomed to seeing alot of lights in the sky - landings at pit. this was moving in completely wrong direction, for either an arrival or departure. the light was totally different from anything we've ever seen. there is occasional helicopter traffic in the area, usually during the day, however for the size of the light and relative proximity - we would've heard the rotors if it was one.
content.summary: 2 erratic red lights

content.detailedDescription:
i'm a police detective and have been an officer for over 17 years so i guess you could consider me a 'trained observer'.  i'm also a backyard astronomer and was in the process of setting up my telescope when i happened to notice high in the east sky at about 70 degrees what appeared to be a circular edge-on disc shaped object moving very slowly to the north.  the sky was completely cloud free and the moon was not out. very few stars were visible since there was still slight residual daylight and i live in a large city with lots of light pollution.  a few seconds after i notice the object it brightened to extremely bright before completely disappearing.  when i say extremely bright i mean significantly brighter than venus when it's out. when the object dimmed out it did so in how an incandescent light bulb goes out, with a lingering fade out.  there were absolutely no other aircraft type lights (or other aircraft for that matter) visible.  as the object dimmed out i could clearly see that it had a physical shape of a circle or edge-on disc.  the object was about the apparent size of maybe a small pea held at arm's length.  a few seconds later the object repeated the brightening and fading one more time.  the second time i saw it the object had moved maybe the distance between two or three open hands held up to the sky.  i opened the back door and called to my wife that i just saw something that i couldn't explain and she came outside.  my wife is also a police detective with 10 years of experience and is not really into astronomy.  just as she stepped onto the patio i pointed to where i saw the object and we looked up.  a few seconds later we both saw the object again brighten, but this time it was much less bright than the first two times i saw it.  i would describe the intensity as just like a 'normal' bright star.  the object was further to the north in what appeared to be a linear trajectory from where i had originally observed it.  after this third sighting we did not see the object again (and i kept looking).  i cannot explain what we observed.
i am familiar with satellite and iss passes and this did not look like any i have seen in the past.  when the object dimmed, it completely disappeared.  i then thought it might have been an iridium flare (although it didn't look like any that i have seen in the past) so i checked the internet for any visible iridium or iss passes but there were none for this evening at about 2100 hrs.  the size of the object was significantly larger than a visible satellite or even the recent iss/shuttle passes.  this object was large enough to actually resolve a circular edge-on disc shape and it appeared to be extremely high in altitude. i've never reported anything like this before but it was so completely unexplainable that i felt compelled to do an internet search on how to report a "ufo".
content.summary: Very slow moving edge-on disc shaped object very high in sky- saw 2 extremely bright and 1 less bright slow white pulses

content.detailedDescription:
My friend called me, i did not witness this myself.  she said she and her husband saw 3 yellow orange fiery glowing orbs near the  davis highway interstate 10 exchange  in pensacola.  she said one looked like it was over my house which is  near olive road and davis highway.  they were driving  towards downtown.  i do not know what street they were on when they saw this.  they were both shocked.  she wonders if it was hot air balloons, but i think that at   that time of night, it's doubtful.  i don't think she or her husband want to be public  themselves with any official reports, for good reason.  

anyway, they said they saw thm, and were trying to get a better look but had to  stop watching and concentrate on driving.   

she called me shortly thereafter, about 8:36 pm and i ran out and didnt
' see anything, and i walked my neighborhood to get better views of the horizons and  sky. all i saw was a shooting star.  so whatever the orbs were, they  were gone.

my friend and her husband are not given to flights of fancy and do not believe in ufo's.  so they think it was a hot air balloons or something like that.  they would not invent this, neither are that type.  they are serious minded, well grounded, and not into the ufo stuff at all.  so if they  said they saw it?  they did!

i hope someone can explain what it was, like maybe there actually were some type of fiery yellow orange balloons floating around then.
content.summary: 3 yellow orange fiery  orbs.
